comment: The main text block containing Chinese characters in seal script with accompanying annotations, arranged in vertical columns. The text is enclosed within a thick black border. On the right edge of the box, there are marginal notes including '小四伯〇田' and '陳元'. The content appears to be from a classical Chinese dictionary or lexicon, possibly related to the *Shuowen Jiezi* or similar works, given the use of seal script and etymological explanations.
